item.title: CS50x - Week 0 Review
item.description: As I am still taking my first formative steps in my IT career, I find myself constantly curious on the different technologies and disciplines available. Consistently, there seems to be a single skill that is universally valued for it’s meaningful utility â€” programming. I found the CS50x course in my pursuit for a litmus test for my affinity to the discipline, and as there seems to be a universal agreement on the quality of the course, I figured it perfectly suitable.

item.title: First Blog Post!
item.description: Not super sure what I have planned for this website – but I figure it’s better to do, experiment, and start defining things later when I develop better experience and opinions. For now, it’s a learning blog and portfolio website!
